BB Cut and pasted from Schwab options report ER date is now correct BullishFor the second day in a row some unusual call activity 301 over puts is being seen in Blackberry Ltd BB 038 to 864 as all of the top 10 most actively traded contracts are calls Option traders are primarily targeting the June 21st 850 call as volume is 29095 versus open interest of 7991 so we know this primarily represents new positioning The bulk of the activity on this contract consisted of various sized blocks that were being bought at various ask prices at various times mostly for between 019030 including a 4950 block that was bought at the ask price of 019 which suggests bullish intent In yesterdays blog BB was highlighted in the Volume Signals section for unusual activity on the June 21st 850 call June 14th 800 call June 14th 850 call and the June 21st 800 call Note BB is tentatively scheduled to report Q1 earnings on June 21st before the market open
